items.name: B&B da Beppe
items.description: Set in the Cinque Terre National Park, located in Corniglia, 200 metres from the beach. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. All rooms come with an electric kettle, a TV and a wardrobe.

items.name: Il Carugio di Corniglia
tips: Perfect if you have a car - free parking
Terrace has incredible views of sea, vineyards and village
Can book entire property for groups

attractions: San Bernardino Sanctuary visible from terrace

location.location_description: Typical Ligurian colorful houses spread over two buildings in Corniglia center with panoramic terrace

outdoor: Panoramic communal terrace with sea, village, vineyard and sanctuary views

parking.notes: Free parking - rare in Cinque Terre. Electric car charging available.

cons: Corniglia has most stairs from station
pros: Panoramic communal terrace with stunning views
Can accommodate groups up to 26 people total

room_types.name: Apartment with Terrace
room_types.description: Well-functioning apartment with equipped kitchen and access to panoramic communal terrace

items.name: Locanda Il Carugio
items.description: Nestled on Corniglia's cliffside, this charming hideaway blends rustic stone walls with modern comfort. Sea-view terraces, lush gardens, and easy access to hiking trails and beaches make it a serene spot to soak in Cinque Terre's beauty. Family business from over three generations.

items.name: Punto Zero Suite
items.description: One-bedroom apartment 5-minute walk from Corniglia Beach, featuring private entrance, fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning, and terrace. Offers moderate prices, making it one of the best places to stay in Cinque Terre on a budget. Organizes tours for guests for a local experience.
